name: Home
description: A lush green-blue world with no life remaining.

name: Pyrus
description: This system has a number of rocky planets orbiting a brown dwarf.

name: Vorga
description: Several gas giants orbiting a binary star. Maybe there's a suitable asteroid?

name: Oceanus
description: A planet almost entirely covered in sulfur-rich oceans. Not viable.

name: Behr'q
description: The asteroid belt here is rich in minerals, but not exactly friendly.

name: LV-426
description: A cold rock, but it looks harmless enough.

name: Forthright
description: Abandoned military station, might have some useful supplies?

name: Reach
description: A promising world with a rich nitrogen atmosphere, but plagued by ion storms.

name: Hardock
description: One of the first human colonies. Now long-dead.

name: Earth 2.0
description: This is a rocky world in the goldilocks zone. Fingers crossed.
